properties.name: University of Leicester Library

properties.name: Institute of Historical Research Library

properties.name: The John Rylands Library
properties.address: The John Rylands Library, 150 Deansgate, Manchester, M3 3EH
properties.notes: Many collections relating to Manchester and region, particularly on business and religion.

properties.name: Ahmed Iqbal Ullah Race Relations Resource Centre
properties.address: Lower Ground Floor, Central Library, St Peter’s Square, Manchester, M2 5PD
properties.notes: Focus on BAME history in Manchester. Includes 300 oral history interviews.

properties.name: Bishopsgate Institute Library
properties.address: Bishopsgate Institute, 230 Bishopsgate, London, EC2M 4QH
properties.notes: Focus on London, radicalism and the counter-culture. Oral history and street photography.

properties.name: Historic England Library and Archive
properties.address: Library,The Engine House,Fire Fly Avenue,Swindon,SN2 2EH
properties.notes: 60,000 print items covering the historic environment. Photographic archive: over a million photos of England's archaeology, historic buildings and social history.

properties.name: University of Nottingham Manuscripts and Special Collections - the East Midlands Collection
properties.address: University of Nottingham , Manuscripts and Special Collections, Kings Meadow Campus,Lenton Lane,Nottingham, NG7 2NR

properties.name: University of Southampton - Cope Collection
properties.address: Special Collections, Hartley Library, University of Southampton, Highfield, Southampton, SO17 1BJ
properties.notes: Focus on Southampton and Hampshire.

properties.name: University of York - Yorkshire collection
properties.address: University Library, University of York, Heslington, York, YO10 5DD

properties.name: University of Leeds Library, Special Collections
properties.address: Brotherton Library, University of Leeds, Woodhouse Ln, Leeds, LS2 9JT
properties.notes: Includes Yorkshire Archaeological & Historical Society collections.

properties.name: Keele University Library - Local Collection
properties.address: Library, Keele University, Keele, Staffordshire, ST5 5BG
properties.notes: 5,000 books, plus pamphlets, newspapers, periodicals and directories, devoted mainly to Staffordshire, but also covering Cheshire, Derbyshire and Shropshire.

properties.name: London Metropolitan University Library Special Collections
properties.address: The Wash Houses, 25 Old Castle Street,London,E1 7NT
properties.notes: Trade Union and communtiy history with focus on London. TUC Library is housed here, London Trades Council minutes 1860 - 1970; London Bookbinders and Paperworkers.  London Met Collections include: Archive of the Irish in Britain; Community Media Collection (community radio and TV in UK); East End Archive (artists); E & A Wates Archive (East London business.)

properties.name: The Queen's College, Oxford
properties.address: The Queen's College, High Street, Oxford, OX1 4AW
properties.notes: The Bridgewater Collection: over 200 rare bibliographic items related to Cumberland and Westmorland, c. 1700-current.  The College has a historic collection with the area.  A large and important collection of heraldic visitation MSS related to various parts of England, collected and copied in the C16th and 17th.

properties.name: Manchester Metropolitan University Library
properties.address: All Saints Library,Manchester,M15 6BH
properties.notes: Greater Manchester-related books, journals, pamphlets, ephemera, parish register transcripts and more, plus a 'Manchester Bibliography' card index of mainly articles, related to Manchester history from c.1975-1995. Also home to the North West Film Archive.

properties.name: Museum of the Order of St John
properties.address: The Museum of the Order of St John, St John’s Gate, St John’s Lane,Clerkenwell, London, EC1M 4DA
properties.notes: The Museum of the Order of St John holds museum, library and archive collections relating to the Order of St John and St John's Ambulance. Material on Clerkenwell Priory is relevant to the history of London.

properties.name: Senate House Library
properties.address: Senate House Library,University of London,Malet Street,London,WC1E 7HU
properties.notes: Senate House Library has strong print and electronic collections of resources about British history, covering all regions of the UK.  Our research collections include academic monographs and journals but also more unusual materials such as pamphlets or the output of small press publishers. We also hold a series of local history journals covering most regions of the UK.

indexing.name: UK Local-Studies-Libraries
indexing.description: The location of local history libraires in the UK
